name: Shiny Hunting Simulator DX
description:
Instructions:

Movement - Arrow keys

Check shiny odds - Space

The rest is done with your mouse!

That's how simple the game is! The happines comes to an end when I think of a mobile port...

Welcome to shiny hunting simulator DX!

As you might have realised by now, this game is about catching shiny pokemon in a gen 5-style pokemon environment!

The rules are simple - every time you encounter a pokemon, your odds of getting a shiny one increase.

Watch out tho - if you encounter a shiny or faint, the shiny odds reset.

All sprites and music belong to Nintendo®.

Update log:

[V1.0] - Release
